snippet: Fawzi al Odah is only the second low-level prisoner to be released this year, and is the first transfer under a new system of parole-board-like hearings to periodically review cases.
abstract: Fawzi al Odah, Kuwaiti man held by United States without trial for nearly 13 years in Guantanamo Bay, Cuba, is released; he is only the second low-level prisoner to be released in 2014, and is the first transfer under a new system of parole-board-like hearings to periodically review cases.
lead_paragraph: Fawzi al Odah is only the second low-level prisoner to be released this year, and is the first transfer under a new system of parole-board-like hearings to periodically review cases.

headline.main: Kuwaiti Released From Guantánamo Under New Review System
headline.print_headline: Kuwaiti Released From Guantánamo Under New Review System
